name: Wandering Moose
description:
This simple game is in development, and I plan to submit it to the Revival Jam. I've made plenty of games, but never actually finished one. I'm hoping this jam will encourage me to get this out there.

Wandering Moose (a working title) was developed for the Oculus Go. During the jam, I'll hope to make it Quest compatible (that is, assuming I get my pre-ordered Quest 2 in time).

I'm uploading it "as is". I haven't touched it in over a year. From what I recall, there are performance issues, and the moose's calf isn't spawning quite right.

The play area is procedurally generated, so each time you play it'll be a new map.

Instructions to play:
To move, touch Oculus Go touchpad in the direction you'd like your moose to walk. i.e. touch north to go forward, west to go left, etc. Click the touchpad to trot/run.
